dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryDestinationDatasetofa
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserQueryDestinationDatasetofa

properties.description: Connection to your data destination store.

sources.name: CuratedDatasetProductTable
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CuratedDatasetProductTable

sources.name: AzureSqlTable2
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlTable2
